page.title: 17Home Life/Housing
page.content: Housing: 18{Council Houses:-}8 are owner-occupied. 10 are rented. Approx. 50% of village population own their own home. 70% are{elderly,}retired or have children over 18years at home. 30% are{young families}with children at the village school. 80% grow their own vegetables. The{evening meal}is usually eaten at 6 p.m. Sunday sees usually a meal of 2 vegetables, meat and fruit pudding. Farmers eat 3 cooked meals a day. 30% have their{annual holiday}away from home. A few homes have{no electricity or {inside toilet,}but this is by choice as{Council Grants}are available for modernisation of properties. Some homes{not on mains water-}use estate supply. Most homes have electricity. None have natural gas.
